#summary Window
#sidebar BranchTypesUiSidebar

= Introduction =

A window on the screen.

= Properties =

|| screenX || integer || Position of X component the widgets top-left corner on the window. ||
|| screenY || integer || Position of Y component the widgets top-left corner on the window. ||
|| width || integer || Width of the widget in pixels. ||
|| height || integer || Height of the widget in pixels. ||
|| backgroundColor (optional) || string || Name of the color used as background color. ||
|| children || `list<Widget>` || Sub widgets. ||
